programme.desc: Probation officer Cathy Madden is given the task of rehabilitating notorious killer "Bloody" Mary Laidlaw back into society after 20 years in jail. Cathy's beliefs are firmly tested when two children disappear near Mary's farm.

programme.title: Caveat
programme.desc: A desperate drifter suffering from partial memory loss agrees to look after his landlord's psychologically troubled niece in an isolated island mansion.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: John Carpenter's chiller about an escaped maniac who returns to his Illinois hometown to continue his bloody rampage.

programme.title: In a Violent Nature
programme.desc: When teens takes a locket from a collapsed fire tower in the woods, they unwittingly resurrect the corpse of a vengeful spirit. The undead killer soon embarks on a bloody rampage to retrieve the locket, slaughtering anyone who gets in his way.

programme.desc: Mecze to nie tylko wspaniałe bramki, ale również efektowne parady bramkarskie, od których często zależą losy spotkania. Przypomnijmy sobie interwencje golkiperów w lidze hiszpańskiej w minionym roku.
